1687461.title: Siameses  love my cat massage
1687461.relevantExperience: In France, my grandparents had a farm with cows, hens, rabbit, donkeys and horses. In my childhood, I had cats and cat sit for friends
1687461.introduction: I am a cat lover. I am not allowed to adopt one in the housing Cooperative where I am currently living in New Cross Gate (London). I am also suffering from cabin fever since the consecutive lockdowns and might not be able to travel -yet again- to visit my family this summer. I am a Royal College of Art graduate hoping to find a job in front end development UX/UI design. Spending a couple of days with a pet having the headspace to work on my portfolio are the ultimate luxuries for me.
1687461.motivation: Pets are important for my well being and help me deal with anxiety and loneliness

references.reference: Helene Martin was my lodger in Camden, London, for two years from 2003. Helene proved to be an excellent, dependable and tidy flatmate, helping us out with feeding and caring for our pet cat, 'Geppetto'. Since then, Helene has kept in touch, frequently staying to cat sit for Geppetto and now Otis, while keeping an eye on the flat. She has also been my first choice of flat sitter when away on business or holiday. Helene is a loyal and trusted friend and companion, conscientious to a degree, with a marked love of pets and ability to care for them and maintain the property they live in. I would like to give her a 5 star reference.

Room J 3 Rochdale Way
                                                                                                    Deptford 
                                                                                                    London 
                                                                                                    SE 8 4BU 


Re Helene Martin

To whom it may concern 

I have known Helene for two years during this time she has provided support for my father which include general care duties and support on day to day life skills such as shopping and cooking. She has also on a number of occasion looked after my father’s cat when he was in hospital or away. 

During theses times I have found her to be reliable and professional. She has a warm supportive manner and my father enjoys the times that she looks after him. 

I have found Helene to be trustworthy and she is always punctual . I would not hesitate in recommending her for any position . 
If you would like more information please do not hesitate to contact me.

Kind regards 
SJ Wyatt 



 I

Hélène has looked after Roger for the weekend a couple of times for me.
You would not know she had stayed there, Roger was well looked after and did not attack her (he is not a trusting cat). 
I would use her services again and would recommend her to my friends.

review.description:
Hélène was a great pet and house sitter for us whilst we were away.

Our plans were a bit last minute and we ended up returning a day earlier than planned, but she was very understanding and flexible which made everything a lot less stressful!  

We received regular updates about how our little Rio was doing and he seemed very content when we returned after our trip. The flat was also spotless, with the bed stripped and sheets already washed for us, which was a dream. She even left a bottle of rosé in the fridge for us which was extremely thoughtful and very much appreciated!

Thank you so much for looking after Rio and the flat for us- we hope you enjoyed your stay :)
Helene is amazing! Really great with communication and wonderful with our cat Maisie. The apartment was spotless when we got back. Thank you!

Helene was AMAZING! My poor kitty managed to hurt himself on the last day of her sit & she was super calm, contacted me & got everything ready for the vet. She kept him extremely happy the whole time & gave him all the cuddles he needed :) My house was spotless as well, she definitely went above & beyond - I’m sure it was cleaner than when I left! Plus she was happy to stay an extra night when I realised I’d got my dates wrong, so flexible & nice to deal with. Helene is a person is lovely to chat to. She updated me during the stay & just got on with with it without needing to ask much. Big big thanks from me xx

Helene was a fantastic house & pet sitter. Our cat Maria was very happy when we returned. So were we, because our flat was left spotless - Helene had obviously gone the extra mile to help too by washing bedding and leaving us cat-friendly flowers for our return. It was lovely. We felt very confident leaving Maria in Helene's capable hands and received regular updates about how Maria was doing, which we loved.  Thank you Helene!
review.reply: Dear Hannah and dear Luke, It was a pleasure looking after little Maria who is just adorable! Thanks for the lovely review! With warm regards.  Hélène

translations.pages_trustAndSafety_reviews_body: Know you’re connecting with the perfect sitter to care for your pet. See what other people say about them, and take a look at ratings and reviews left by other owners.
translations.pages_trustAndSafety_feedback_body: Want to know if a sit is right for you? For a first-hand account of what it's like to care for the owner's pets and home, look for feedback left by fellow sitters on their listing.

translations.pages_trustAndSafety_data_heading: Your data is safe with us
translations.pages_trustAndSafety_data_body: From your payment details to your private conversations, all your information on our platform is encrypted, safe, and secure.
translations.pages_trustAndSafety_moreInformation_hel: Get all your questions answered. Visit our Help Centre or chat with our award-winning Membership Services team.
translations.pages_trustAndSafety_moreInformation_vet: Rest easy knowing sitters can call our 24/7 vet advice line anytime during a sit. Owners also have access to year-round video calls with vets on certain plans.
translations.pages_trustAndSafety_verifications_body: At TrustedHousesitters, it's important that all our members feel safe, secure and supported when connecting online with one another. That's why we ask all our sitters to complete their free identity checks below, so that you can connect with confidence. You can see which checks each sitter has on their profile.
translations.pages_trustAndSafety_verifications_backg: A sitter has completed a background check which confirms the following:

<listItem>National Criminal Records search has come back clear</listItem><listItem>No county-level adverse policy violations are found</listItem><listItem>They aren’t on any sex offender registry</listItem><listItem>SSN Trace & Address History has been completed</listItem><listItem>They aren’t on the Domestic & Global Terrorist Watchlists</listItem><listItem>FCRA-compliant</listItem>
This service is provided by <anchor>Evident</anchor>, a secure and accredited third party provider. Currently available for US-based sitters only.
translations.pages_trustAndSafety_verifications_id_ch: A sitter's identity has been confirmed and cross-checked, using an official government ID (such as a passport, driving licence or National Identity Card).
This service is provided by <anchor>Evident</anchor>, a secure and accredited third party provider.
translations.pages_trustAndSafety_verifications_exter: References have been provided on behalf of the sitter vouching for their character or house and pet sitting experience. This could be a landlord, employer or someone they have previously house or pet sat for.
translations.pages_trustAndSafety_verifications_email: Sitter’s email address and phone number has been checked and confirmed to be genuine.
translations.pages_pricing_header_owner: Choose your annual pet & home owner membership
translations.pages_pricing_header_all_types: Simple annual plans for pet & travel lovers
translations.pages_pricing_pending_plan_change: You have a pending plan change - selecting a new plan will override this
translations.pages_pricing_faq_fee_cover_label: What does the membership fee cover?
translations.pages_pricing_faq_fee_cover_body: <1>All members pay just once a year to connect with fellow pet and travel lovers, exchanging home and pet care for the chance to stay in unique places around the world.</1><1>With the owner membership you can connect with reviewed and verified sitters who don’t charge, whenever you go away. The Sitter membership lets you explore and arrange unlimited sits, near and far away. And the Combined membership gives you the best of both worlds — experience house and pet sitting and find like-minded people to sit for you too. Our plans also include a range of features to make using our service safe and stress-free - choose the best one for you above.</1>
translations.pages_pricing_faq_how_does_it_work_body: <1>TrustedHousesitters is a match-making platform that connects pet owners with care-orientated sitters, all around the world. Our global network of pet lovers exchange accommodation for pet care, allowing pet lovers to travel.</1><1>The first step is to purchase your chosen plan. Owners can then create a listing and start receiving applications from verified and reviewed sitters, while sitters can create a profile and start applying for sits. Or if you decided to become a combined member then you can do it all.</1>
translations.pages_pricing_faq_sitters_charge_body: <1>No - never. So what's the catch? There isn't one! Sitters registered with TrustedHousesitters sit for free because they love animals and the unique travel experiences that house and pet sitting offers.</1><1>In exchange for lovingly and respectfully caring for your pets and home, your sitter gets to experience life in your location. Because they aren't motivated by money, you can find a sitter whose number one priority is to care for your home and pets.</1>
translations.pages_pricing_faq_is_it_safe_body: <1>As part of our industry-leading Trust & Safety features, we verify the contact details of all house & pet sitters registered with TrustedHousesitters, and give them the option to complete ID checks and verification.</1><1>For extra peace of mind, we encourage sitters to request third party references and member reviews on their profiles.</1>
translations.pages_pricing_faq_get_a_sit_label: How easy is it to get a sit?
translations.pages_pricing_faq_get_a_sit_body: <1>There are more sits on TrustedHousesitters than on all other global house sitting websites combined, so you’ve come to the right place.</1><1>There's plenty that will help owners get to know you so you can secure your first sit, such as creating a great profile and earning free verifications. Sitters with a reference are twice as likely to secure a sit quickly. All you need is a short recommendation from a friend, family member, landlord or employer. You can also complete a secure ID/document verification to give owners extra peace-of-mind.</1>
translations.pages_pricing_faq_who_pays_travel_label: Who pays for travel to a sit?
translations.pages_pricing_faq_who_pays_travel_body: <1>Through TrustedHousesitters, you can stay for free in homes worldwide - you just need to get yourself there! That means it's your responsibility to take care of your own travel expenses to get to and from a sit.</1><1>With accommodation often taking up to a third of the cost of travel, you're sure to make a great saving!</1>
translations.pages_pricing_membership_help_text: If you need any assistance with your membership, get in touch - one of our Membership Services team will be happy to help you.

translations.pages_careers_values_win3x_body: The more we can make all our sitters, owners and their pets happy, the more we can grow

translations.pages_careers_subheading: TrustedHousesitters is growing — build a community with us
translations.pages_careers_intro: Come build a community. We’re helping people from all over the world to travel, meet new friends and know their pets are safe at home. We’re looking for talented, passionate people to join us.
translations.pages_careers_benefits_learninganddevelo: Keen and curious? From conferences to courses, you’ll be helped and cheered on to grow personally and professionally.
translations.pages_careers_benefits_sitting_body: With a dedicated travel allowance and time to go sitting, you’re positively encouraged to get away from your desk.
translations.pages_careers_benefits_health_body: From a cycle scheme and eye care to your contributory pension, we help keep you happy and healthy now and in the future.
translations.pages_careers_benefits_techtools_body: At TrustedHousesitters, there’s a MacBook for every team member and the techie tools you need to let your talents shine.
translations.pages_careers_benefits_foodfurryfriends_: Help yourself to fresh fruit, a fridge full of drinks, tasty breakfasts, Fuel Fridays, and cuddles from the four-pawed team members.
translations.pages_careers_benefits_fungames_body: Whether it’s a big win or a small success, we like to open the treat tin, celebrate and spend time together.

translations.pages_searchListings_infocard_howItWorks: Your love of pets can take you places! Join as a house sitter to stay with adorable pets near and far away.
translations.pages_searchListings_infocard_switchToSi: Going away? Whether you’re setting off on a relaxing trip or an exciting house sit, your pets can stay safe at home with a house sitter too.
translations.pages_searchListings_social_proof_quote_: I am so blessed to have this experience and to be able to have a companion by my side the entire time. I’m forever grateful for the opportunity TrustedHousesitters provides! This is truly life changing.
Adelia, sitter member from Bath, UK
translations.pages_searchListings_aWinWinWithoutMoney: While you provide free house and pet care, owners offer you free accommodation in return. The only cost is your annual membership, making it an affordable and fulfilling way to travel.
translations.pages_searchListings_why_youll_love_hous: From home comforts to the calming company of pets, house sitting offers so much more.
Explore new places while making a difference to the lives of pets and people along the way.
You don’t have to travel far. With house sitting, you can find a world of adventures just around the corner.
translations.pages_searchListings_feel_safe_secure_an: Want to know if a house sit is right for you? Look for feedback previous sitters have left on the owner's listing.
House sit in homes with peace of mind they’re covered at no extra cost to you or the owner.
With a free direct line to a dedicated team of veterinary nurses, you can quickly clear up any pet queries.
Learn more about trust and safety
translations.pages_dogSittersNewYork_title: Dog Sitters in New York City
translations.pages_dogSittersNewYork_meta_description: Taking a trip away from New York City? Dog Sitters in the TrustedHousesitters community won’t charge to care for your pets. Connect with verified sitters today.
translations.pages_dogSittersNewYork_heading: Dog sitters in New York City
translations.pages_dogSittersNewYork_subheading: Going away? Join today to connect with thousands of reviewed and verified dog sitters exchanging free pet care for a place to stay.
translations.pages_dogSittersNewYork_ny_profiles_head: Meet dog sitters making memories, not money
translations.pages_dogSittersNewYork_timeline_heading: How to arrange a dog sitter
translations.pages_dogSittersNewYork_timeline_stepOne: Once you've bought your membership, create a listing with plenty of pictures of your home and pets. Next, add any dates you need a dog sitter.
translations.pages_dogSittersNewYork_timeline_stepTwo: Dog sitters in New York City or people from further afield may apply to your sit, sending an introductory message and their sitter profile for you to review.
translations.pages_dogSittersNewYork_timeline_stepThr: Get to know the dog sitters that apply, asking them plenty of questions until you're sure they're the perfect person to care for your home and pets.
translations.pages_dogSittersNewYork_timeline_stepFou: Set off knowing your dog will be safe and happy at home with a pet lover like you. You can even ask your dog sitter to send you updates while you're away.
translations.pages_dogSittersNewYork_informationSecti: What owners and sitters have to say
“Joining such a wonderful community of animal lovers has completely changed the way we travel.”
Terry, dog owner, New York City
See more stories from owner members
translations.pages_dogSittersNewYork_reassurance_insu: When you arrange and confirm a sit through TrustedHousesitters, your home will be covered for up to $1 million (USD) at no extra cost. After all, it’s unlikely you’ll need it — but it’s there if you do.
translations.pages_dogSittersNewYork_reassurance_veri: Connect with verified pet sitters who have gone through a range of ID checks to provide extra peace of mind. Just take a look at the Trust Badge on their profile to see what level of verification they’ve achieved.
translations.pages_dogSittersNewYork_reassurance_revi: Whether you want a sitter for your dog, cat, or pet of any kind, know you’re connecting with the right person by reading ratings and reviews left by other owners. Many sitters also provide references from people like their employer.
translations.pages_dogSittersNewYork_other_profiles_h: A world of loving dog sitters

translations.components_regwallDialog_regwallFAQs_lab: How do I know that it’s safe?
translations.components_regwallDialog_regwallFAQs_con: TrustedHousesitters lets you travel with peace of mind knowing your pets are happy and safe where they’re most comfortable — at home. A sitter can care for your pet and look after your home. They’ll even water your plants.

Sign up for free to continue exploring the platform. You’ll then need to buy a membership to create your listing. Sitters can then send you their applications. This gives you the chance to get to know them and find the best sitter for your pet and home.

Sitters can get two levels of verification. These include confirming their contact details and checking their ID documents. Their profile will feature a verification badge if they do. So make sure you look through their profile before deciding.
No, sitters won't charge. Because the sitter isn’t there to make money you can travel knowing your pet is being cared for by an animal lover like you.
translations.components_regwallDialog_regwallFAQs_lab: How many sits can I do?
Where can I house and pet sit?
What qualifications do I need to be a sitter?
translations.components_regwallDialog_regwallFAQs_con: Sign up for free to continue exploring the platform. You’ll then need to buy a membership to create your profile and apply for house and pet sits. You can apply for as many as you like and you get the final choice whether you go ahead with the sit.
Once you’ve bought your membership there’s no limit to the number of sits you can do throughout the year. So why not stay in a home away from home with a new pet companion?
You can sit anywhere you want to around the world. If you prefer to sit for people closer to home, that’s great. If you want to see new parts of the world, then you can do that too.

You don’t need any specific qualifications to be a sitter, but all levels of experience are welcome. When you become a member, you can list any pet, home or garden experience you might have on your profile.

translations.pages_searchProfiles_summary_info_how_pe: How pet sitters can help you
Enjoy your holiday with added peace of mind knowing your pets and home are well looked after.
From dog walks to belly rubs, sitters keep your pets happy in the one place they feel truly relaxed — their own home.
With a community of sitters looking to stay with pets like yours, there's no need to ask friends or family for help.
translations.pages_searchProfiles_meansMoreWithoutMon: Pet sitters aren’t here to make money. All they ask for is a free place to stay, which means your only cost for unlimited pet care is an annual membership — it's that simple.
translations.pages_searchProfiles_connectAndShareWith: How do you choose from the pet sitters that apply? Start by reading their references and reviews left by other owners.
Your home is covered during every sit, at no extra cost. After all, it’s unlikely you’ll need it — but it’s there if you do.
There are several stages of ID checks. To see what level a pet sitter has achieved so far, just take a look at their profile.
Learn more about trust and safety
translations.pages_searchProfiles_social_proof_quote_: Since joining, we’ve had the pleasure of hosting five fantastic sitters in our Swiss apartment. We’ve had paramount care for our furry friends and also met some fantastic people. All I can say is thank goodness we tried TrustedHousesitters!

translations.pages_searchProfiles_timeline_heading: How to arrange a pet sit
translations.pages_searchProfiles_timeline_stepOne_bo: Write a description, add plenty of photos, and the dates you’ll be away. You can even tailor it to inspire dog sitters or like-minded cat lovers to apply.
translations.pages_searchProfiles_timeline_stepTwo_bo: Pet sitters near and far away can apply to your sit. They’ll send a personalised application for you to consider alongside their sitter profile.
translations.pages_searchProfiles_timeline_stepThree_: Chat to the pet sitters that apply, ask questions, and get to know them. They don’t charge, so choose the sitter that’s right for your pet and you.

translations.pages_searchProfiles_timeline_stepFour_b: Set off on your travels knowing your pets and home are in the hands of your chosen sitter. When it’s time to return, you'll be welcomed back by truly happy pets.
translations.pages_searchProfiles_fairExchange_body: Both you and the pet sitter buy an annual membership.<1></1>You then connect to arrange pet sits that help you travel with peace of mind. In return, the sitter enjoys caring for your pet and home — and they don’t charge.

translations.plan_cardFeature_upsell_dailyAlerts: unlimited saved searches and instant alerts
translations.plan_cardFeature_description_freeVerific: All sitters are encouraged to earn free verifications, offering everyone more peace of mind. Depending on your chosen level, Basic or Standard, there are several stages of checks to become verified, including confirming your email, phone number, references and identity. The level you have will be displayed on your profile to help you stand out as trustworthy to owners.
translations.plan_cardFeature_description_vetAdviceSi: For extra peace of mind, you can call our 24/7 vet advice line anytime during a sit and speak to a veterinary expert.
translations.plan_cardFeature_name_vetCallsSitting: Free phone calls with vets when pet sitting
translations.plan_cardFeature_description_vetCallsSit: Enjoy peace of mind while caring for pets on a sit, with free phone consultations with veterinary experts - 24/7, anytime you need it.
translations.plan_cardFeature_name_vetVideosSitting: Free video calls & online chat with vets when pet sitting
translations.plan_cardFeature_description_vetVideosSi: Enjoy peace of mind while caring for pets on a sit, with free phone, chat or video consultations with veterinary experts - 24/7, anytime you need it.
translations.plan_cardFeature_description_dedicatedMe: <paragraph>In addition to our basic support, get extra assistance to secure your first sit quickly and easily.</paragraph><paragraph>We’ll guide you through setting up the perfect profile, getting references and verifications and help you search and apply to sits.</paragraph><paragraph>We'll also contact you during a sit to make sure everything is running smoothly.</paragraph>

<paragraph>In addition to our basic support, get extra assistance to secure your first sit or sitter quickly and easily.</paragraph><paragraph>We’ll guide you through setting up the perfect listing or profile and securing a sitter or finding your first sit.</paragraph><paragraph>We'll also contact you or your sitter during a sit to make sure everything is running smoothly.</paragraph>
translations.plan_cardFeature_name_unlimitedSits: Unlimited house sits as a sitter
translations.plan_cardFeature_name_unlimitedCare: Unlimited pet & home care from verified sitters at no extra cost
translations.plan_cardFeature_description_insuranceBa: <paragraph>Some home insurance policies won't cover leaving your home in the hands of a third party, such as a sitter.</paragraph><paragraph>For extra peace of mind, if you have an exisiting home insurance policy, then our Home & Contents Protection covers every sit confirmed through TrustedHousesitters at no extra cost to you, up to $1 million USD.</paragraph><paragraph>You're protected against property damage, theft, and public liability, if a sitter has an accident in your home.</paragraph><paragraph>The Guarantee is underwritten by global insurer GUARDHOG.</paragraph><paragraph>Please note: you must have an existing home insurance policy for this additional protection to be valid.</paragraph>
translations.plan_cardFeature_name_vetAdviceLine: Free calls with vets for your sitter
translations.plan_cardFeature_description_vetAdviceLi: All pet sitters have access to 24/7 advice from veterinary experts with our dedicated Vet Advice Line so you can enjoy peace of mind while you are away.
translations.plan_cardFeature_description_application: If you do not receive any sitter applications within 14 days of posting your first listing, you’ll receive your money back with no strings attached.
translations.plan_cardFeature_description_memberSuppo: <paragraph>In addition to our basic support, get extra assistance to secure your first house and pet sitter quickly and easily.</paragraph><paragraph>We’ll guide you through setting up the perfect listing and securing a sitter.</paragraph><paragraph>We'll also contact your sitter during a sit to make sure everything is running smoothly.</paragraph>
translations.plan_cardFeature_name_listingBoost: Boost your listing in search results
translations.plan_cardFeature_description_vetAdviceLi: Enjoy peace of mind with free phone, chat or video consultations with veterinary experts. Available for you and your sitter, 24/7, anytime you need it.
translations.plan_cardFeature_name_vetAdviceLineVideo: Free video calls with vets, anytime you need
translations.plan_cardFeature_description_vetAdviceLi: Enjoy peace of mind with free phone, chat or video consultations with veterinary experts. Available for you and your sitter, 24/7, anytime you need it.
translations.plan_cardFeature_description_airportLoun: Escape crowded, noisy departure terminals and claim your free lounge passes. Get 2 lounge passes for you and a friend to use in over 600 airport lounges worldwide.
translations.plan_cardFeature_description_cancellatio: <paragraph>In the unlikely event of your owner cancelling, our guarantee provides up to $150 compensation per night to cover the cost of alternative accommodation, up to $1500 per sit.</paragraph><paragraph>You’re covered up to 30 days annually over as many sits as you like. Or, if you choose to do longer sits, then rest assured you’re still covered for your first 3 sits each year, even if they span over 30 days.</paragraph>
In an unlikely event of sitter cancellation, our insurance provides up to $150 compensation per night to cover the cost of alternative pet care, up to $1500 per sit.

<heading>As an owner</heading><paragraph>In an unlikely event of sitter cancellation, our insurance provides up to $150 compensation per night to cover the cost of alternative pet care, up to $1500 per sit.</paragraph><heading>As a sitter</heading><paragraph>In the unlikely event of your owner cancelling, our guarantee provides up to $150 compensation per night to cover the cost of alternative accommodation, up to $1500 per sit.</paragraph><paragraph>You’re covered up to 30 days annually over as many sits as you like. Or, if you choose to do longer sits, then rest assured you’re still covered for your first 3 sits each year, even if they span over 30 days.</paragraph>
translations.plan_cardFeature_description_vetAdviceLi: Access to 24/7 advice from veterinary experts with our dedicated Vet Advice Line. Pet sitters also have access so you can enjoy peace of mind while you are away.
translations.plan_cardFeature_name_premiumBadgeCombin: Premium badge on your listing & profile
translations.plan_cardFeature_description_thirdPartyI: For extra peace of mind, if a pet causes damage or injury to another person, their property, or pets whilst under your control during a sit, and this is due to negligence on your part, then you will be covered by our Sitter guarantee up to $1,000,000 per incident.
translations.plan_cardFeature_description_dailyAlerts: Don’t miss out on that perfect sit - save up to 3 searches and be notified by daily email alerts when house sits which match your criteria become available.
translations.plan_cardFeature_name_instantAlerts: Instant alerts for unlimited saved searches
translations.plan_cardFeature_description_instantAler: Don’t miss out on that perfect sit - save your searches to be notified by alerts from our app and daily email alerts when house sits which match your criteria become available.
translations.plan_cardFeature_description_backgroundC: <paragraph>As well as our free email, phone, ID and reference checks, Standard and Premium sitters have a free Background Check.</paragraph><paragraph>This more than doubles your chance of securing a house sit, helping owners trust you with their home and pets. </paragraph><paragraph>Your details won’t be shared with anyone.</paragraph><paragraph>You will have completed the Background Check if we verify that:</paragraph><list><listItem>National Criminal Records search has come back clear</listItem><listItem>You have no county-level adverse policy violations</listItem><listItem>You aren’t on any sex offender registry</listItem><listItem>SSN Trace & Address History has been completed</listItem><listItem>You aren’t on the Domestic & Global Terrorist Watchlist</listItem><listItem>FCRA-compliant</listItem></list><paragraph>This service is provided by Evident, a secure and accredited third party provider.  Currently available for US based members only.</paragraph><paragraph><backgroundcheckpolicy>Background Check Policy</backgroundcheckpolicy></paragraph>

translations.plan_highlight_sitter_description_verifi: Earn free verifications and stand out from the crowd with ID checks and references
translations.plan_highlight_sitter_description_commun: Discover thousands of places to call home with long and short stays wherever you are in the world
translations.plan_highlight_sitter_description_unlimi: Pay once a year and enjoy unlimited access to as many sits as you like. Owners never charge for providing a nice place to stay in exchange for pet & house care. It’s that simple.
translations.plan_highlight_combined_description_unli: Access our verified sitters and thousands of places to stay as much as you wish. Members never charge for providing dedicated care or a nice place to stay. It’s that simple.

translations.plan_reviews_owner_1_heading: Mary & Harry found the perfect sitters for dog Barclay
translations.plan_reviews_owner_1_quote: “Barclay (our dog) enjoys Angela & John’s company so much, he now barks with an English accent. They are without a doubt, the greatest house sitters of all time!”
translations.plan_reviews_owner_1_location: Mary & Harry, owners from San Diego, US
translations.plan_reviews_owner_2_heading: Stuart & Richard enjoy holidays knowing cat Marley is in safe hands
translations.plan_reviews_owner_2_quote: “TrustedHousesitters allows such peace of mind and we can really enjoy our holidays knowing that Marley the cat and our home have been left in safe hands!”
translations.plan_reviews_owner_2_location: Stuart & Richard, owners from London, UK
translations.plan_reviews_owner_3_heading: Sue & Roger came home to a very happy dog
translations.plan_reviews_owner_3_quote: “Robi & Stu were wonderful, we came home to a dog who had obviously been living her idea of heaven! We would definitely welcome them back anytime.”
translations.plan_reviews_owner_3_location: Sue & Roger, owners from Darlington, AUS
translations.plan_reviews_sitter_1_heading: Peter & Debra found a home away from home
translations.plan_reviews_sitter_1_quote: “We returned many times to house sit for Don, Louise and Margaux and became family, we even felt as though Margaux was 'our dog' when we were with her.”
translations.plan_reviews_sitter_1_location: Peter & Debra, sitters from Perth, AUS
translations.plan_reviews_sitter_2_heading: Gretechen & Jeff have been able to retire early
translations.plan_reviews_sitter_2_quote: “TrustedHousesitters means freedom to travel around the world while having fun caring for sweet pets. We’re actually able to retire ahead of schedule because of it!”
translations.plan_reviews_sitter_2_location: Gretchen & Jeff, sitters from Oregon, US
translations.plan_reviews_sitter_3_heading: Maryse & Jeff experience new cultures as locals
translations.plan_reviews_sitter_3_quote: “We travel, discover and explore the world, staying in a home environment with loving pets, making friends and experiencing new cultures as a local.”
translations.plan_reviews_sitter_3_location: Maryse & Jeff, Sitters from San Diego, US
translations.plan_reviews_combined_1_heading: Barb enjoys housesitting, knowing her cats Prana & Mudita are cared for
translations.plan_reviews_combined_1_quote: “Prana & Mudita (and our home) are happy, loved & appreciated; we are free to enjoy our travels and OUR Housesitting.”
translations.plan_reviews_combined_1_location: Barb, owner & sitter from Oregon, US
translations.plan_reviews_combined_2_heading: After missing his dogs on his travels, Malcolm became a sitter too
translations.plan_reviews_combined_2_quote: “Our pups loved staying home and making new human friends. The fact that we missed them when we were away was the reason we became sitters ourselves.”
translations.plan_reviews_combined_2_location: Malcolm, owner & sitter from Wales, UK
translations.plan_reviews_combined_3_heading: Carol & Gerry have made lifelong friends
translations.plan_reviews_combined_3_quote: “Joining TrustedHousesitters has been life changing. We’ve met owners and sitters who share our passion for travel and pets. Many are now lifelong friends!”
translations.plan_reviews_combined_3_location: Carol & Gerry, owners & sitters from Sydney, AUS
